title: Searching for My Soulmate
text:
I said to myself that I would never do this again (post on the damn hell hole that is Craigslist) but I guess not. Kind of sad that I'm on here. I'm young and all. *SIGH* Even though I found someone I genuinely loved/had my first relationship through this God-forsaken site (around this time of year too *cue dramatic music*), so I'm willing to take another stab at it. *insert Jason theme music* lol

Welp, here I go..

I'm 6'3, mixed (Native American, Black, German, Russian), black hair, my eyes change color from time to time between brown and dark green, 192 lbs, I work out frequently and run at least 2 miles per weekday so I'm athletic. I like running 5ks and training for small events (ran my first official 5k race this fall even though I used to run twice of that )I'm also clean, disease free, and very hygienic. Fifty Shades of Funk is no bueno lol. I have a super dark sense of humor that is fairly universal (being it's not solely dark) but (i.e.: What's the best way to get bubble gum out of your hair?.... CANCER). I told you so and you laughed. You're terrible just like me. haha. I also have the attention span of a squirrel sometimes. That and I like saying squirrel. It's hilarious as hell to me. God, I'm weird... Anyways.. Lol

I'm a student at UTA studying Computer Science and accomplishing my goals. I'm very driven and look for the same in my partner. I'm also a God-fearing man, religion plays a part in my life but it doesn't take it over. I'm purty damn busy so I don't have too much time to dabble in the dating world. I get that I'm fairly mature for my age but my sense of humor can throw you off which can be either hella dark or somewhat childish.

I'm both INFJ/ENFJ (My personalities switch frequently) personalities (we are a rarity!) but I stick to my INFJ personality quite a bit. I'm a health nut, witty, sarcastic, kind, and my love knows no bounds. I'm the life of the party kind of guy mixed with the kind that enjoys sipping organic green tea while reading a book on a patio.

I love to help people in any way that I can, I don't feel complete without helping others. I'm an intellectual, a huge workout enthusiast, gaymer, and a Naruto (as well as just a general) anime nerd. Just a huge nerd in general like the kind that finds a decent physics joke funny (Exhibit A: A neutron walked into a bar and asked, "How much for a gin and tonic?" The bartender smiled wryly and replied, "For you, no charge.") I told you I'm weird. Moving on... lol

I'm also fairly spontaneous (in the good way, not like "Surprise, I'm pregnant with demonic sextuplets" kind of way) haha


I love reading, singing, playing piano, gaming, performing, completing various puzzles such as Sudoku and numerous crossword puzzles that challenge the mind, working out, running, doing imbecilic things, making people laugh, cooking, making sarcastic comebacks, helping others, twerking (jk) lol, video games, drawing, poetry, djing, photography, sports (that I want to play), throwing shade, and troubleshooting technology. 

I have a knack for teaching myself instruments so I'm going for violin next (taught myself to play piano proficiently in less than a month.)

Music is my life. I've been singing since I was 3 and I love all types of music from Bach/Beethoven ( I ADORE classical music), The Fray, Coldplay, Paramore, Panic at the Disco, Fall Out Boy, Anarbor, Blackbear, Troye Sivan (as the ghetto black people say: "Das bae." lol) Leona Lewis, the Neighborhood, Oh Wonder, all the way to J. Cole, Kendrick Lamar, and Logic. I'm also getting into French Rap and R&B (look into Hocus Pocus and Milk, Coffee, and Sugar.)

I'm shy at first kind of, but I don't bite. Unless you're food. Then I bite a lot.

But I would like to be close to someone, to have that intimacy, to be able to be there for someone. I don't indulgeth in NETFLIX and CHILL, but nothing warms my heart more than being able to hold the one I love. My life revolves around helping other people and being there to protect that special someone. I just got out of my first relationship not too long ago so I'm recovering from the pain slowly but surely. Even though it was short-lived, I loved them with every fibre of my being. When I love someone, I do everything I can to make them happy because when they are happy is when I'm happy. Nothing warms my heart and soul more than being the reason why another human being is smiling or laughing. I invest my everything into my relationships and into those I love.

I've experienced so much in life already and I know that I know would like to find someone to spend the rest of my life with. 

I believe in chivalry, cuddles (yass ze cuddles), showing affection, and actively showing as well as letting that special someone know that I care for and appreciate them. Once I fall for someone, it's forever and my loyalty is unwavering.

Don't like people who are hung up on the idea of age too much (to a certain degree). "Age ain't nothing but a number." For the most part..lol But I'm an old soul and I'm a multi-faceted individual so you would just have to get to know me.

I like people with depth. No, not in that way either (for those that like to "ho, ho, ho around." xD). Lol, but if you are just as deep as a kiddie pool, we may not be compatible. 

Honesty, maturity, and intelligence are the most important features to me in terms of a partner. Someone who is kind, selfless, strong, loving, and honest. If we click, I would like to go slow as friends first and let it grow naturally. Haste makes waste as my grandmother would say. I definitely see that as truth.



Quote(s) of the year: 
"Never make someone your priority when you are only their option."
"If they won't take you at your worst, then they don't deserve you at your best."
"Never apologize for being yourself. Say what you want to say, how you want to say it."
"Manners maketh man."

My age preference is from 18-32 years of age. I'm highly attracted to those of caucasian or latino decent although all may send me an email. Health is a massive part of my life so someone who knows how to take care of themselves as well. Someone who is in shape: mentally, spiritually, and physically as well as disease free. That's all for my nitpicking.

SO if you were able to bear with me, PLEASE SEND ME A FACE PICTURE (I'll send one right after you (not CL though, what goes into the public eye stays there)), your KIK (email is as primitive as dinosaur shit lol), and a little about yourself ^-^. 

*I'm NOT opposed to friends either, but I can sense intentions fairly well. Meaning I'm probably not going to befriend someone who SOLELY wants to get into my pants.*

title: Searching for My Soulmate
text:
I said to myself that I would never do this again (post on the damn hell hole that is Craigslist) but I guess not. Kind of sad that I'm on here. I'm young and all. *SIGH* Even though I found someone I genuinely loved/had my first relationship through this God-forsaken site (around this time of year too *cue dramatic music*), so I'm willing to take another stab at it. *insert Jason theme music* lol

Welp, here I go..

I'm 6'3, mixed (Native American, Black, German, Russian), black hair, my eyes change color from time to time between brown and dark green, 192 lbs, I work out frequently and run at least 2 miles per weekday so I'm athletic. I like running 5ks and training for small events (ran my first official 5k race this fall even though I used to run twice of that )I'm also clean, disease free, and very hygienic. Fifty Shades of Funk is no bueno lol. I have a super dark sense of humor that is fairly universal (being it's not solely dark) but (i.e.: What's the best way to get bubble gum out of your hair?.... CANCER). I told you so and you laughed. You're terrible just like me. haha. I also have the attention span of a squirrel sometimes. That and I like saying squirrel. It's hilarious as hell to me. God, I'm weird... Anyways.. Lol

I'm a student at UTA studying Computer Science and accomplishing my goals. I'm very driven and look for the same in my partner. I'm also a God-fearing man, religion plays a part in my life but it doesn't take it over. I'm purty damn busy so I don't have too much time to dabble in the dating world. I get that I'm fairly mature for my age but my sense of humor can throw you off which can be either hella dark or somewhat childish.

I'm both INFJ/ENFJ (My personalities switch frequently) personalities (we are a rarity!) but I stick to my INFJ personality quite a bit. I'm a health nut, witty, sarcastic, kind, and my love knows no bounds. I'm the life of the party kind of guy mixed with the kind that enjoys sipping organic green tea while reading a book on a patio.

I love to help people in any way that I can, I don't feel complete without helping others. I'm an intellectual, a huge workout enthusiast, gaymer, and a Naruto (as well as just a general) anime nerd. Just a huge nerd in general like the kind that finds a decent physics joke funny (Exhibit A: A neutron walked into a bar and asked, "How much for a gin and tonic?" The bartender smiled wryly and replied, "For you, no charge.") I told you I'm weird. Moving on... lol

I'm also fairly spontaneous (in the good way, not like "Surprise, I'm pregnant with demonic sextuplets" kind of way) haha


I love reading, singing, playing piano, gaming, performing, completing various puzzles such as Sudoku and numerous crossword puzzles that challenge the mind, working out, running, doing imbecilic things, making people laugh, cooking, making sarcastic comebacks, helping others, twerking (jk) lol, video games, drawing, poetry, djing, photography, sports (that I want to play), throwing shade, and troubleshooting technology. 

I have a knack for teaching myself instruments so I'm going for violin next (taught myself to play piano proficiently in less than a month.)

Music is my life. I've been singing since I was 3 and I love all types of music from Bach/Beethoven ( I ADORE classical music), The Fray, Coldplay, Paramore, Panic at the Disco, Fall Out Boy, Anarbor, Blackbear, Troye Sivan (as the ghetto black people say: "Das bae." lol) Leona Lewis, the Neighborhood, Oh Wonder, all the way to J. Cole, Kendrick Lamar, and Logic. I'm also getting into French Rap and R&B (look into Hocus Pocus and Milk, Coffee, and Sugar.)

I'm shy at first kind of, but I don't bite. Unless you're food. Then I bite a lot.

But I would like to be close to someone, to have that intimacy, to be able to be there for someone. I don't indulgeth in NETFLIX and CHILL, but nothing warms my heart more than being able to hold the one I love. My life revolves around helping other people and being there to protect that special someone. I just got out of my first relationship not too long ago so I'm recovering from the pain slowly but surely. Even though it was short-lived, I loved them with every fibre of my being. When I love someone, I do everything I can to make them happy because when they are happy is when I'm happy. Nothing warms my heart and soul more than being the reason why another human being is smiling or laughing. I invest my everything into my relationships and into those I love.

I've experienced so much in life already and I know that I know would like to find someone to spend the rest of my life with. 

I believe in chivalry, cuddles (yass ze cuddles), showing affection, and actively showing as well as letting that special someone know that I care for and appreciate them. Once I fall for someone, it's forever and my loyalty is unwavering.

Don't like people who are hung up on the idea of age too much (to a certain degree). "Age ain't nothing but a number." For the most part..lol But I'm an old soul and I'm a multi-faceted individual so you would just have to get to know me.

I like people with depth. No, not in that way either (for those that like to "ho, ho, ho around." xD). Lol, but if you are just as deep as a kiddie pool, we may not be compatible. 

Honesty, maturity, and intelligence are the most important features to me in terms of a partner. Someone who is kind, selfless, strong, loving, and honest. If we click, I would like to go slow as friends first and let it grow naturally. Haste makes waste as my grandmother would say. I definitely see that as truth.



Quote(s) of the year: 
"Never make someone your priority when you are only their option."
"If they won't take you at your worst, then they don't deserve you at your best."
"Never apologize for being yourself. Say what you want to say, how you want to say it."
"Manners maketh man."

My age preference is from 18-32 years of age. I'm highly attracted to those of caucasian or latino decent although all may send me an email. Health is a massive part of my life so someone who knows how to take care of themselves as well. Someone who is in shape: mentally, spiritually, and physically as well as disease free. That's all for my nitpicking.

SO if you were able to bear with me, PLEASE SEND ME A FACE PICTURE (I'll send one right after you (not CL though, what goes into the public eye stays there)), your KIK (email is as primitive as dinosaur shit lol), and a little about yourself ^-^.

title: Searching for My Soulmate
text:
I said to myself that I would never do this again (post on the damn hell hole that is Craigslist) but I guess not. Kind of sad that I'm on here. I'm young and all. *SIGH* Even though I found someone I genuinely loved/had my first relationship through this God-forsaken site (around this time of year too *cue dramatic music*), so I'm willing to take another stab at it. *insert Jason theme music* lol

Welp, here I go..

I'm 6'3, mixed (Native American, Black, German, Russian), black hair, my eyes change color from time to time between brown and dark green, 192 lbs, I work out frequently and run at least 2 miles per weekday so I'm athletic. I like running 5ks and training for small events (ran my first official 5k race this fall even though I used to run twice of that )I'm also clean, disease free, and very hygienic. Fifty Shades of Funk is no bueno lol. I have a super dark sense of humor that is fairly universal (being it's not solely dark) but (i.e.: What's the best way to get bubble gum out of your hair?.... CANCER). I told you so and you laughed. You're terrible just like me. haha. I also have the attention span of a squirrel sometimes. That and I like saying squirrel. It's hilarious as hell to me. God, I'm weird... Anyways.. Lol

I'm a student at UTA studying Computer Science and accomplishing my goals. I'm very driven and look for the same in my partner. I'm also a God-fearing man, religion plays a part in my life but it doesn't take it over. I'm purty damn busy so I don't have too much time to dabble in the dating world. I get that I'm fairly mature for my age but my sense of humor can throw you off which can be either hella dark or somewhat childish.

I'm both INFJ/ENFJ (My personalities switch frequently) personalities (we are a rarity!) but I stick to my INFJ personality quite a bit. I'm a health nut, witty, sarcastic, kind, and my love knows no bounds. I'm the life of the party kind of guy mixed with the kind that enjoys sipping organic green tea while reading a book on a patio.

I love to help people in any way that I can, I don't feel complete without helping others. I'm an intellectual, a huge workout enthusiast, gaymer, and a Naruto (as well as just a general) anime nerd. Just a huge nerd in general like the kind that finds a decent physics joke funny (Exhibit A: A neutron walked into a bar and asked, "How much for a gin and tonic?" The bartender smiled wryly and replied, "For you, no charge.") I told you I'm weird. Moving on... lol

I'm also fairly spontaneous (in the good way, not like "Surprise, I'm pregnant with demonic sextuplets" kind of way) haha


I love reading, singing, playing piano, gaming, performing, completing various puzzles such as Sudoku and numerous crossword puzzles that challenge the mind, working out, running, doing imbecilic things, making people laugh, cooking, making sarcastic comebacks, helping others, twerking (jk) lol, video games, drawing, poetry, djing, photography, sports (that I want to play), throwing shade, and troubleshooting technology. 

I have a knack for teaching myself instruments so I'm going for violin next (taught myself to play piano proficiently in less than a month.)

Music is my life. I've been singing since I was 3 and I love all types of music from Bach/Beethoven ( I ADORE classical music), The Fray, Coldplay, Paramore, Panic at the Disco, Fall Out Boy, Anarbor, Blackbear, Troye Sivan (as the ghetto black people say: "Das bae." lol) Leona Lewis, the Neighborhood, Oh Wonder, all the way to J. Cole, Kendrick Lamar, and Logic. I'm also getting into French Rap and R&B (look into Hocus Pocus and Milk, Coffee, and Sugar.)

I'm shy at first kind of, but I don't bite. Unless you're food. Then I bite a lot.

But I would like to be close to someone, to have that intimacy, to be able to be there for someone. I don't indulgeth in NETFLIX and CHILL, but nothing warms my heart more than being able to hold the one I love. My life revolves around helping other people and being there to protect that special someone. I just got out of my first relationship not too long ago so I'm recovering from the pain slowly but surely. Even though it was short-lived, I loved them with every fibre of my being. When I love someone, I do everything I can to make them happy because when they are happy is when I'm happy. Nothing warms my heart and soul more than being the reason why another human being is smiling or laughing. I invest my everything into my relationships and into those I love.

I've experienced so much in life already and I know that I know would like to find someone to spend the rest of my life with. 

I believe in chivalry, cuddles (yass ze cuddles), showing affection, and actively showing as well as letting that special someone know that I care for and appreciate them. Once I fall for someone, it's forever and my loyalty is unwavering.

Don't like people who are hung up on the idea of age too much (to a certain degree). "Age ain't nothing but a number." For the most part..lol But I'm an old soul and I'm a multi-faceted individual so you would just have to get to know me.

I like people with depth. No, not in that way either (for those that like to "ho, ho, ho around." xD). Lol, but if you are just as deep as a kiddie pool, we may not be compatible. 

Honesty, maturity, and intelligence are the most important features to me in terms of a partner. Someone who is kind, selfless, strong, loving, and honest. If we click, I would like to go slow as friends first and let it grow naturally. Haste makes waste as my grandmother would say. I definitely see that as truth.



Quote(s) of the year: 
"Never make someone your priority when you are only their option."
"If they won't take you at your worst, then they don't deserve you at your best."
"Never apologize for being yourself. Say what you want to say, how you want to say it."
"Manners maketh man."

My age preference is from 18-32 years of age. I'm highly attracted to those of caucasian or latino decent although all may send me an email. Health is a massive part of my life so someone who knows how to take care of themselves as well. Someone who is in shape: mentally, spiritually, and physically as well as disease free. That's all for my nitpicking.

SO if you were able to bear with me, PLEASE SEND ME A FACE PICTURE (I'll send one right after you (not CL though, what goes into the public eye stays there)), your KIK (email is as primitive as dinosaur shit lol), and a little about yourself ^-^.
